title: Remove ntcdf-4.2-min.jar in 4.10.1, 4.9.1
description: Solr-Cell contains the netcdf-4.2-min.jar file, which contains some LGPL licensed classes in binary form.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1624071 from Uwe Schindler in branch 'dev/branches/lucene_solr_4_10'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1624071 ]

SOLR-6503: Removed support for parsing netcdf files in Solr Cell because of license issues
